oai_dc:dc.dc:title: All Alberta Survey, 1988
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Population Research Laboratory
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The 1988 All Alberta Study was the second in an annual series administered by the Department of Sociology, University of Alberta, through its research facility, the Population Research Laboratory (PRL). This random sample survey of households in the province of Alberta has enabled academic researchers, local community agencies, and non-profit organizations to explore a broad spectrum of social issues in an on-going research framework in Alberta.
